CustomField.description: This is a field that is installed by and used with the Adoption Dashboard AppExchange package. If your org already has a similar field, you can change the reports that are part of the Adoption Dashboard package to use your custom field and then delete this field.
CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( Subject , "Email"), "Email", IF(CONTAINS( Subject , "Cold Call"), "Cold Call", IF(CONTAINS( Subject , "Call"), "Call", IF(CONTAINS( Subject , "Meeting"), "Meeting", IF(CONTAINS( Subject , "On Site Visit"), "Site Visit", IF(CONTAINS( Subject , "Quote"), "Send Letter/Quote", "Other"))))))
CustomField.label: DB Activity Type
